scripts.serve: npm run serve:approuter & npm run serve:cds
scripts.hybrid: npx cds bind --exec -- npm run serve
scripts.hybrid:approuter: npx cds bind --exec -- npm run serve:approuter
scripts.hybrid:portal: npx cds bind --exec -- npm run dev -w portal
scripts.hybrid:cds: npx cds bind --profile hybrid --exec -- cds debug --profile hybrid
scripts.hybrid:mcp-client: npx cds bind --profile hybrid --exec -- npm run start -w examples/client
scripts.setup:local: npm run bind:all && npm run serve:hybrid
scripts.setup:dev: npm install && npm run bind:auth && npm run serve
scripts.deploy: npm run build:push && npm run deploy:helm
scripts.deploy:srv: npm run build  && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t scai-dev.common.repositories.cloud.sap/grant-management/api:v31 -f Dockerfile . --push && kubectl rollout restart deployment agents-srv
scripts.deploy:helm: npm run build && helm upgrade agents ./gen/chart --install --create-namespace
scripts.openapi:generate: cds compile srv --service all -o app/router/api-docs/openapi --to openapi
scripts.test:oauth: npx cds bind --profile hybrid --exec -- node --import tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --experimental-vm-modules ./test/oauth-basic-flow.test.ts
scripts.test:grant-mgmt: npx cds bind --profile hybrid --exec -- node --import tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --experimental-vm-modules ./test/grant-management.test.ts
scripts.test:grant-tools: npx cds bind --profile hybrid --exec -- node --import tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --experimental-vm-modules ./test/grant-tools.test.js
scripts.token:user: npx cds bind --profile hybrid --exec -- node scripts/get-mcp-token.js 2>/dev/null | tail -1
scripts.test:mcp:list-tools: npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/inspector@latest --cli --config mcps.json --server grant-management --method tools/list --header "Authorization: Bearer $(npm run token:password:access_token --silent)"
scripts.test:mcp:list-tools:local: npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/inspector@latest --cli --config mcps.local.json --server grant-management --method tools/list --header "Authorization: Bearer $(npm run token:password:access_token --silent)"
scripts.compile:mcp: npx cds compile srv --service all -2 edmx > grants-management.edmx
scripts.token:client-credentials: npx cds bind --profile hybrid --exec -- ias-token client-credentials 2>/dev/null | tail -1
scripts.token:password: npx cds bind --profile hybrid  --exec -- ias-token password 2>/dev/null | tail -1
scripts.token:exchange: npx cds bind --profile hybrid --exec -- ias-token exchange 2>/dev/null | tail -1
scripts.token:exchange:from-password: npx cds bind  --exec -- ias-token exchange --subject_token "$(npm run token:password:id_token --silent)" --subject_token_type urn:ietf:params:oauth:token-type:id_token
